Sure, here are 20 more enhancement ideas:

1. Add a citation feature to allow users to easily cite content in various citation styles.
2. Implement a collaborative filtering feature to suggest content based on similar users' behavior.
3. Introduce a feature to enable users to follow authors or subjects and receive notifications on new content.
4. Develop a feature to enable users to create and save custom collections of content.
5. Create a feature to enable users to compare and contrast multiple search results side-by-side.
6. Integrate with a plagiarism detection service to help users identify potential plagiarism in their work.
7. Add a feature to enable users to browse content by subject area or topic.
8. Implement a feature to enable users to search within specific parts of content, such as chapters or sections.
9. Develop a feature to allow users to create and save alerts for new content related to specific keywords or topics.
10. Create a feature to enable users to filter search results by access type, such as open access or subscription only.
11. Add a "cite this page" feature to enable users to easily cite individual pages within a piece of content.
12. Introduce a feature to enable users to rate the quality of content based on criteria such as accuracy and relevance.
13. Implement a feature to enable users to search within specific sources, such as specific journals or databases.
14. Develop a feature to enable users to search by multimedia content, such as images or videos.
15. Add a feature to enable users to share content via email or instant messaging services.
16. Introduce a feature to enable users to save notes or annotations on individual pages of content.
17. Implement a feature to enable users to search by author affiliation or geographic location.
18. Create a feature to enable users to search within specific types of content, such as case studies or conference proceedings.
19. Add a feature to enable users to view related content in a graphical format, such as a mind map or network graph.
20. Introduce a feature to enable users to receive personalized recommendations based on their reading history and preferences.
